text: Hi, how are you today?
Great what about you? Do you donate to children's charities often?
Not bad, I donate all the time specifically to Save The Children, they are a great charity because 100% of the money donated is given to those children who need it most how about you?
I have donated to them in the past. Do you donate through MTurk only?
Well, today all donations are directlt deducted from the Mturk task payment so would you be interested in donating today?
I would, I usually donate some portion of my winnings when it's a children's charity. They are the most vulnerable in society.
Oh, I know children did not ask to grow up in these coditions adults have let them down in so many ways
I know, it's also so sad the the more nutricious foods are always the most expensive. I donate to the NYC Food bank also. They help a lot of city kids.
That's another great cause
How much to you plan on donating today considering that we may get a bonus?
Normally I donate about $1.00 how about you?
I usually donate like I would in real life... like a quarter here and a quarter there.
well, every cent counts that's what I say or a penny saved is a penny earned either way it works out the same
Yes, and it all adds up at the end of the month especially when you're also struggling to make ends meet.
oh, yes definately, so do I have your commitment to a donation today?
Definitely, I will donate my $0.30. What about you?
yes, I was going to as soon as I saw the charity it was going to such a great cause
Oh, mine just says "children\'s charity" but does not mention any specifics. Either way its cool.
I'm pretty sure its Save the Children because it says it on my side
Nope, mine doesn't maybe that was the point, to see if I would donate to just any charity. Still I always hope the money actually gets to them.
It will through the researchers they promised
